text: Hey there! I'm just starting my journey as a little eggplant seedling, and I'm feeling pretty great right now. My roots are beginning to emerge and everything feels just right - the warmth is perfect and my soil has just the right amount of moisture for me to grow strong. The air could be a tiny bit more humid, but honestly, I'm doing wonderfully and I'm excited to keep sprouting for you!

temperature.message: Temperature is perfect for germination phase.

humidity.message: Humidity is slightly below optimal for germination phase.

light.message: Light is perfect for germination phase.

soil_moisture.message: Soil Moisture is perfect for germination phase.
